author: Staff Reporter
text:
Traffic on Velachery Main Road in Selaiyur was affected for nearly one hour on Monday following a protest by investors of a chit fund company.

The company, which has more than 3,000 investors on their list, has not paid them their dues for the past six months, the protesters alleged. More than 100 people, who had invested in the company, took part in the agitation. They dispersed only after an assurance from the Selaiyur police that their complaints would be looked into.
title: Investors protest
